summary: A gang of crooks has kidnapped a rich heiress come up against a beautiful, but lethal alien who has crash-landed her spaceship on Earth.
cast: Robert Clarke|Kenne Duncan|Marilyn Harvey|Jeanne Tatum|Shirley Kilpatrick|Ewing Miles Brown|Al Avalon|Scott Douglas|Egan
